Key Match Events: James and Christie combined for 11 points down the stretch, capped by James' seventh 3-pointer with 59 seconds left
Post-Match Reflections: Christie is emerging as a key contributor in his third season. He has scored in double digits for the fourth time in five games, providing 3-and-D excellence.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Davis sat out for only the second time this season to rest his sprained left ankle, which the star big man hurt on Christmas.
Point guard Gabe Vincent also sat with a hip injury.
